sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import { Box, Heading, Text, Button, Flex, Stack, Image } from "@chakra-ui/react";

const CoursePage = () => {
  return (
    <Box p={10}>
      <Flex justifyContent="space-between">
        <Box>
          <Heading as="h1" size="2xl" mb={5}>
            React Course
          </Heading>
          <Text fontSize="xl" mb={5}>
            Learn how to build dynamic web applications with React!
          </Text>
          <Button colorScheme="purple" size="lg">
            Enroll Now
          </Button>
        </Box>
        <Image src="/react-logo.svg" alt="React Logo" w={200} />
      </Flex>
      <Box mt={10}>
        <Heading as="h2" size="xl" mb={5}>
          What You'll Learn
        </Heading>
        <Stack spacing={5}>
          <Text fontSize="lg">
            - React fundamentals, including JSX syntax, components, and props
          </Text>
          <Text fontSize="lg">
            - State management with React hooks
          </Text>
          <Text fontSize="lg">
            - Routing and navigation with React Router
          </Text>
          <Text fontSize="lg">
            - Fetching data from APIs using Axios
          </Text>
          <Text fontSize="lg">
            - Building a complete web application from scratch
          </Text>
        </Stack>
      </Box>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default CoursePage;
